product_description.description: Ready-mix concrete produced at batching plants with controlled operations allowing precise mix designs, delivered in a freshly mixed, plastic, or unhardened state.
product_list: 50MPa New Plymouth 5O1S8UEC Ready Mix and precast concrete
product_description.substances_of_concern: The product does not contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for Authorisation.

raw_materials: Secondary Materials (fly ash, silica fume, GGBFS)

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging.

recycled_materials.recycled_materials_used: No recycled materials used in producing the product.

lca_information.declared_unit: 1 m³ of ready-mix concrete in use
impact_categories_calculated_manually: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM)
Use of non-renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM)

modules_included: A1 - Extraction and production of primary raw materials
system_boundaries.reason_for_exclusion: Holcim (NZ) does not have operational control over installation; distribution and use stages excluded.

principles: Initial allocation divides system sub-processes and collects input/output data.
First allocation step partitions inputs/outputs based on physical relationships.
Second allocation step (worst case) uses economic value if physical relationships cannot be established.
allocation.application: Allocation based on annual production volume by physical relationships; fuel consumption for mixing/loading measured per declared unit without allocation.

cut_off_rules.minimum_inclusion: 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) per module; 99% of renewable and non-renewable primary energy use and total mass input.
exclusions: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed.
cut_off_rules.packaging: No packaging except for raw material packaging which is excluded.

electricity_mix.source: New Zealand Ministry of Business, Innovation & Employment

downstream_processes.deconstruction: Assumed to use drilling to break and remove concrete

lca_information.co2_uptake: No CO2 uptake in any module declared

transport_modes.raw_materials_to_plant: Truck (heavy trucks for aggregates and cement, medium trucks for other materials)

installation.reason: Holcim (NZ) does not have operational control over installation at construction site

end_of_life.deconstruction_method: Drilling to break and remove concrete
end_of_life.disposal: All products assumed to be landfilled
end_of_life.carbonation: No carbonation at end of life

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_method: Impacts for co-products allocated according to PCR 2019:14 Construction Products and Construction Services (co-produced goods, multi-output allocation).

about_holcim_nz.company_description: Holcim New Zealand is a leading solutions provider for design and construction needs in New Zealand since 1888, supplying cement, aggregates, and ready-mix concrete.
about_holcim_nz.global_presence: Holcim employs 60,000 people worldwide across Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, Aggregates, and Solutions & Products segments.
about_holcim_nz.sustainability_commitment: Holcim has industry-first 2030 and 2050 net-zero targets validated by the Science Based Targets initiative, leading transition towards low-carbon construction and circular economy.
about_holcim_nz.local_low_carbon_solutions: Holcim NZ developed a range of low carbon solutions specifically for the New Zealand market.

lca_assumptions_and_limitations.raw_material_packaging: Excluded due to lack of comprehensive data.
lca_assumptions_and_limitations.emission_factors: Most assigned emission factors are generic proxies; supplier-specific data to replace when available.
lca_assumptions_and_limitations.transport_distances: Estimated average distances used where data unavailable.
lca_assumptions_and_limitations.greenstar_and_is_indicators: Included for future reporting; transport impacts for Holcim cement product use generic background data with assumptions on transport distances.
lca_assumptions_and_limitations.waste_production: Estimated by Holcim; more specific data could improve accuracy.
lca_assumptions_and_limitations.landfill_transport_distance: Assumed 50 km based on major city to landfill distances.

data_quality_assessment.raw_materials: Primary source data from Holcim (NZ) 2022, very good quality.
data_quality_assessment.disposal: Based on national GHG report, fair quality.
